attributes.action: Broadcast HM Armed Forces Colours Once a week when on combat operations
attributes.additional_details: All the while HM Armed Forces are, active in a war zone, on combat operations then at 8am on Monday morning on BBC news the ceremony of colours should be broadcast. Can choose a different location every week or from the Cenotaph. This will be a dignified reminder that during the week armed forces are serving in dangerous circumstances.
